greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle T(n,k) = A277647(n, A005117(k)), read by rows.
comment: The columns of this triangle are the columns of A277647 with squarefree index.
Other that the first (with length 1), row n has length A278100(n).
link: Jason Kimberley, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10716 (the first 37 rows of the triangle)
example: where the first 11 terms of A005117(k) are
mathematica: DeleteCases[#, 0] & /@ Table[Boole[SquareFreeQ@ k] Floor[n/Sqrt@ k], {n, 8}, {k, n^2}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Nov 24 2016 *)
results.author: _Jason Kimberley_, Nov 10 2016
ext: Missing a(3009) in b-file inserted by _Andrew Howroyd_, Feb 28 2018
